Source.Name: naev
Source.Summary: Naev is a 2D space trading and combat game, in a similar vein to Escape Velocity
Source.Description: NAEV is played from a top-down perspective, featuring fast-paced combat, many ships, a large variety of equipment and a large galaxy to explore. The game is highly open-ended, letting you proceed at your own pace.
